full_summary:
# Health Canada Workspaces H1085-234872

## Official Government of Canada Tender Announcement
### Brief Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the procurement of office furniture, as per the specific requirements of the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC).

### Tender Details

*   **Contract Number:** H1085-234872
*   **Tender Reference Number:** WS4313806047-Doc4314220866
*   **Publication Date:** November 20, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** December 15, 2023 at 2:00 PM (EST)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 28, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** No end date specified
*   **Tender Status:** Expiring

### Eligibility and Requirements

The solicited contractors must meet certain eligibility criteria. Their responses to this solicitation will be evaluated based on the lowest price among the participating suppliers.

### Applicable Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

### Procurement Process

This tender will be conducted through the Selective Tendering method.

### Contact and Information

If you require any information or clarification regarding this tender announcement, kindly contact Mr. King Quan through king.quan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Notice URL and Attachments

The detailed notice for this tender can be accessed at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18057401?extsite=MTgwNTc0MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. However, there is no supporting documentation available for this tender at the time of this announcement. 

### Important Note

AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME: All required supporting documentation and bid submission for this tender must be submitted no later than December 12, 2023 before 2:00 PM (EST). Bids submitted after this time will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Kindly disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response
